QuestData.Title: The Righteous March
QuestData.Description: The Iron Horde have overtaken Karabor. If we don't act now, we will lose the city.$b$bExarch Akama and the last of our forces are trapped within the city, but your garrison forces are still outside the temple, awaiting your orders.$B$BCome and fly with me. We will meet your forces on the field. With the naaru by our side, we will make one last charge to retake the city!
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort your garrison forces to the Temple of Karabor by slaying all the orcs in the Path of Light.
QuestData.RewardText: Now, to destroy these orcs once and for all.

Objectives.Objective: Escort your Garrison Army to Karabor
